1010 -> 101000110010110101110000011010010011 -> 001000110110110101110000011010010011 -> error_detectado
0111 -> 011101001100011001100111101000101110 -> 001101001100011001100111101000100110 -> error_detectado
0001 -> 000110100101000001011101111100011011 -> 000010100101000001011101011100011011 -> error_detectado
